verses.verse: לַמְנַצֵּ֬חַ ׀ <S%H5329><s%> To the chief Musician לִבְנֵי־ <S%H1121><s%> for the sons קֹ֬רַח <S%H7141><s%> of Korah מִזְמֽוֹר׃ <S%H4210><s%> A Psalm שִׁמְעוּ־ <S%H8085><s%> Hear זֹ֭את <S%H2063><s%> likewise כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all הָֽעַמִּ֑ים <S%H5971><s%> this all [ye] people הַ֝אֲזִ֗ינוּ <S%H238><s%> give ear כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all יֹ֥שְׁבֵי <S%H3427><s%> all [ye] inhabitants חָֽלֶד׃ <S%H2465><s%> of the world

גַּם־ <S%H1571><s%> Both בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> afflicted אָ֭דָם <S%H120><s%> man גַּם־ <S%H1571><s%> Both בְּנֵי־ <S%H1121><s%> afflicted אִ֑ישׁ <S%H376><s%> he יַ֝֗חַד <S%H3162><s%> together עָשִׁ֥יר <S%H6223><s%> rich וְאֶבְיֽוֹן׃ <S%H34><s%> and poor

פִּ֭י <S%H6310><s%> My mouth יְדַבֵּ֣ר <S%H1696><s%> shall speak חָכְמ֑וֹת <S%H2454><s%> of wisdom וְהָג֖וּת <S%H1900><s%> and the meditation לִבִּ֣י <S%H3820><s%> of my heart תְבוּנֽוֹת׃ <S%H8394><s%> [shall be] of understanding

אַטֶּ֣ה <S%H5186><s%> I will incline לְמָשָׁ֣ל <S%H4912><s%> to a parable אָזְנִ֑י <S%H241><s%> mine ear אֶפְתַּ֥ח <S%H6605><s%> I will open בְּ֝כִנּ֗וֹר <S%H3658><s%> upon the harp חִידָתִֽי׃ <S%H2420><s%> my dark saying

לָ֣מָּה <S%H4100><s%> Why אִ֭ירָא <S%H3372><s%> Wherefore should I fear בִּ֣ימֵי <S%H3117><s%> in the days רָ֑ע <S%H7451><s%> of evil עֲוֹ֖ן <S%H5771><s%> [when] the iniquity עֲקֵבַ֣י <S%H6120><s%> of my heels יְסוּבֵּֽנִי׃ <S%H5437><s%> shall compass

הַבֹּטְחִ֥ים <S%H982><s%> They that trust עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> in חֵילָ֑ם <S%H2428><s%> in their wealth וּבְרֹ֥ב <S%H7230><s%> themselves in the multitude עָ֝שְׁרָ֗ם <S%H6239><s%> of their riches יִתְהַלָּֽלוּ׃ <S%H1984><s%> and boast

אָ֗ח <S%H251><s%> his brother לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> No פָדֹ֣ה <S%H6299><s%> by any means יִפְדֶּ֣ה <S%H6299><s%> redeem אִ֑ישׁ <S%H376><s%> None [of them] can לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> Or יִתֵּ֖ן <S%H5414><s%> nor give לֵאלֹהִ֣ים <S%H430><s%> to God כָּפְרֽוֹ׃ <S%H3724><s%> a ransom
וְ֭יֵקַר <S%H3365><s%> [is] precious פִּדְי֥וֹן <S%H6306><s%> (For the redemption נַפְשָׁ֗ם <S%H5315><s%> of their soul וְחָדַ֥ל <S%H2308><s%> and it ceaseth לְעוֹלָֽם׃ <S%H5769><s%> forever

וִֽיחִי־ <S%H2421><s%> That he should still live ע֥וֹד <S%H5750><s%> on לָנֶ֑צַח <S%H5331><s%> for ever לֹ֖א <S%H3808><s%> not יִרְאֶ֣ה <S%H7200><s%> [and] not see הַשָּֽׁחַת׃ <S%H7845><s%> corruption

כִּ֤י <S%H3588><s%> for יִרְאֶ֨ה ׀ <S%H7200><s%> For he seeth חֲכָ֘מִ֤ים <S%H2450><s%> [that] wise men יָמ֗וּתוּ <S%H4191><s%> die יַ֤חַד <S%H3162><s%> likewise כְּסִ֣יל <S%H3684><s%> the fool וָבַ֣עַר <S%H1198><s%> and the brutish person יֹאבֵ֑דוּ <S%H6><s%> perish וְעָזְב֖וּ <S%H5800><s%> and leave לַאֲחֵרִ֣ים <S%H312><s%> to others חֵילָֽם׃ <S%H2428><s%> their wealth

קִרְבָּ֤ם <S%H7130><s%> Their inward בָּתֵּ֨ימוֹ ׀ <S%H1004><s%> thought [is that] their houses לְֽעוֹלָ֗ם <S%H5769><s%> [shall continue] for ever מִ֭שְׁכְּנֹתָם <S%H4908><s%> [and] their dwelling לְדֹ֣ר <S%H1755><s%> places to all וָדֹ֑ר <S%H1755><s%> generations קָֽרְא֥וּ <S%H7121><s%> they call בִ֝שְׁמוֹתָ֗ם <S%H8034><s%> after their own names עֲלֵ֣י <S%H5921><s%> and אֲדָמֽוֹת׃ <S%H127><s%> [their] lands

וְאָדָ֣ם <S%H120><s%> Nevertheless man בִּ֭יקָר <S%H3366><s%> [being] in honour בַּל־ <S%H1077><s%> will not יָלִ֑ין <S%H3885><s%> abideth נִמְשַׁ֖ל <S%H4911><s%> not he is like כַּבְּהֵמ֣וֹת <S%H929><s%> the beasts נִדְמֽוּ׃ <S%H1820><s%> [that] perish

זֶ֣ה <S%H2088><s%> This דַ֭רְכָּם <S%H1870><s%> This their way כֵּ֣סֶל <S%H3689><s%> [is] their folly לָ֑מוֹ וְאַחֲרֵיהֶ֓ם ׀ <S%H310><s%> yet their posterity בְּפִיהֶ֖ם <S%H6310><s%> their sayings יִרְצ֣וּ <S%H7521><s%> approve סֶֽלָה׃ <S%H5542><s%> Selah

כַּצֹּ֤אן ׀ <S%H6629><s%> Like sheep לִֽשְׁא֣וֹל <S%H7585><s%> in the grave שַׁתּוּ֮ <S%H8371><s%> they are laid מָ֤וֶת <S%H4194><s%> death יִ֫רְעֵ֥ם <S%H7462><s%> shall feed וַיִּרְדּ֘וּ <S%H7287><s%> shall have dominion בָ֤ם יְשָׁרִ֨ים ׀ <S%H3477><s%> on them and the upright לַבֹּ֗קֶר <S%H1242><s%> over them in the morning [וְצִירָם כ] (וְ֭צוּרָם <S%H6736><s%> beauty ק) לְבַלּ֥וֹת <S%H1086><s%> shall consume שְׁא֗וֹל <S%H7585><s%> in the grave מִזְּבֻ֥ל <S%H2073><s%> from their dwelling לֽוֹ׃

אַךְ־ <S%H389><s%> but אֱלֹהִ֗ים <S%H430><s%> But God יִפְדֶּ֣ה <S%H6299><s%> will redeem נַ֭פְשִׁי <S%H5315><s%> my soul מִֽיַּד־ <S%H3027><s%> from the power שְׁא֑וֹל <S%H7585><s%> of the grave כִּ֖י <S%H3588><s%> for יִקָּחֵ֣נִי <S%H3947><s%> for he shall receive סֶֽלָה׃ <S%H5542><s%> me Selah

אַל־ <S%H408><s%> not תִּ֭ירָא <S%H3372><s%> Be not thou afraid כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> when יַעֲשִׁ֣ר <S%H6238><s%> is made rich אִ֑ישׁ <S%H376><s%> when one כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> When יִ֝רְבֶּה <S%H7235><s%> is increased כְּב֣וֹד <S%H3519><s%> when the glory בֵּיתֽוֹ׃ <S%H1004><s%> of his house

כִּ֤י <S%H3588><s%> when לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> not בְ֭מוֹתוֹ <S%H4194><s%> For when he dieth יִקַּ֣ח <S%H3947><s%> he shall carry nothing away הַכֹּ֑ל <S%H3605><s%> all manner לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> will not יֵרֵ֖ד <S%H3381><s%> shall not descend אַחֲרָ֣יו <S%H310><s%> after כְּבוֹדֽוֹ׃ <S%H3519><s%> his glory

כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> Though נַ֭פְשׁוֹ <S%H5315><s%> his soul בְּחַיָּ֣יו <S%H2416><s%> Though while he lived יְבָרֵ֑ךְ <S%H1288><s%> he blessed וְ֝יוֹדֻ֗ךָ <S%H3034><s%> and [men] will praise כִּי־ <S%H3588><s%> when תֵיטִ֥יב <S%H3190><s%> thee when thou doest well לָֽךְ׃

תָּ֭בוֹא <S%H935><s%> He shall go עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> against דּ֣וֹר <S%H1755><s%> to the generation אֲבוֹתָ֑יו <S%H1><s%> of his fathers עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> against נֵ֝֗צַח <S%H5331><s%> alway לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> not יִרְאוּ־ <S%H7200><s%> see אֽוֹר׃ <S%H216><s%> light

אָדָ֣ם <S%H120><s%> Man בִּ֭יקָר <S%H3366><s%> [that is] in honour וְלֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> without יָבִ֑ין <S%H995><s%> and understandeth נִמְשַׁ֖ל <S%H4911><s%> not is like כַּבְּהֵמ֣וֹת <S%H929><s%> the beasts נִדְמֽוּ׃ <S%H1820><s%> [that] perish
